name: Omic Bounce
description:
Omic Bounce is a very fun relaxing game. Omic Bounce has game difficulty levels, namely easy and hard. Played by avoiding viruses that walk near the player. If the player manages to avoid the virus, he will get 5 points. If the player hits the virus, the player will issue a particle effect. 

Use the right and left directions on the keyboard to avoid viruses.

Trailer : Trailer Game

GOOD LUCK HUMAN!
